pages.text: ʿaynan yashrabu biha ʿibadu l-lahi yufajjirunaha tafjiran
yufuna bil-nadhri wayakhafuna yawman kana sharruhu mus'tatiran
wayut'ʿimuna l-taʿama ʿala hubbihi mis'kinan wayatiman wa-asiran
innama nut'ʿimukum liwajhi l-lahi la nuridu minkum jazaan wala shukuran
inna nakhafu min rabbina yawman ʿabusan qamtariran
fawaqahumu l-lahu sharra dhalika l-yawmi walaqqahum nadratan wasururan
wajazahum bima sabaru jannatan wahariran
muttakiina fiha ʿala l-araiki la yarawna fiha shamsan wala zamhariran
wadaniyatan ʿalayhim zilaluha wadhullilat qutufuha tadhlilan
wayutafu ʿalayhim bianiyatin min fiddatin wa-akwabin kanat qawarira
qawarira min fiddatin qaddaruha taqdiran
wayus'qawna fiha kasan kana mizajuha zanjabilan
ʿaynan fiha tusamma salsabilan
wayatufu ʿalayhim wil'danun mukhalladuna idha ra-aytahum hasib'tahum lu'lu-an manthuran
wa-idha ra-ayta thamma ra-ayta naʿiman wamul'kan kabiran
ʿaliyahum thiyabu sundusin khud'run wa-is'tabraqun wahullu asawira min fiddatin wasaqahum rabbuhum sharaban tahuran
inna hadha kana lakum jazaan wakana saʿyukum mashkuran
inna nahnu nazzalna ʿalayka l-qur'ana tanzilan
fa-is'bir lihuk'mi rabbika wala tutiʿ min'hum athiman aw kafuran
wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika buk'ratan wa-asilan
